channel.title: Inventory items
channel.description:
Hi all, How can i get the id's of the items in the inventory ? I've checked the tut from radeon ( http://radeon.byethost8.com/tuts/inventory.htm ) but i dont understand that because it is for unnamed deop :(.
Gr. Bas

item.title: Inventory items
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

public int findItemInInv(String name) { 
	for (int i = 0; i<28; i++) 
	{
		int id = inventory(i); 
			if (id != -1) 
			{
				String thisName = itemName(id); 
					if(thisName != null && thisName.indexOf(name)>-1) 
					{	
					return i; 
				} 
			} 
		} 
	return -1; 
}

public String itemName(int id) { 
	^itemnameclass^ itemDesc = ^itemnameclass^.^itemnamemethod^(id); 
		if (itemDesc.^itemnamestring^ != null) 
			{ 
			return itemDesc.^itemnamestring^; 
		} else 
	{ 
return ""; 
} 
}

public int inventory(int slot) { 
	Class32 thingie = Class32.method521(anIntArray1142[3]); 
		int result = thingie.method521(thingie.anIntArray608[0]).anIntArray583[slot]-1; 
			if (!(thingie.method521(thingie.anIntArray608[0]).anIntArray583[slot] > 0)) result = -1; 
	return result; 
}

You figure out what’s between the ^^'s and it will work :).

E: Added code tags :p.

Read full topic
